alert.note: Alert for Concho (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:49PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Concho County through 530 PM CDT... At 448 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of Us-87 And Ranch Road 2134, or near 3 miles northeast of Eden, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Concho County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
